short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The simplest way to save websites, articles, videos, images and anything else on the Web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The internet is noisy. When you find something you like, save it to your PasteDeck and create your own, clutter-free, corner of the internet! ðŸ’«

The PasteDeck Chrome extension provides the simplest and quickest method to capture websites, articles, videos, and anything else on the Web. With just a single click, the content you've saved is added to your PasteDeck account and seamlessly syncs across all your devices. Paste anything, access anywhere! 

+ Save websites, images, videos, articles, recipes and so much more. All of your links in one place, organized the way you want them, accessible from any device, anywhere, anytime.
+ Whether you're planning a wedding, searching for a holiday or just looking for the perfect gift, curate your shortlist and share with friends and family to discuss and deliberate.
+ Create multiple Decks for different categories, projects and topics. Make them public to share with the World, or go incognito to keep your links private and confidential.
+ Add your favorite RSS feeds and your trusted news sources will automatically deliver their latest articles directly to your PasteDeck.
+ Read and view your saved content directly in PasteDeck without the distraction of Ads and/or Pop-ups.

Register your PasteDeck account for FREE at https://pastedeck.com
